attributes.title: ✨🧚🏻‍♀️🌈🍃🍄
attributes.review: This app is so slow and doesn’t work AT ALL.  It’ll make you nauseous when you download it. When you first open the app it glitches like crazy and makes your whole phone shut down. 😞 It really down stink, I was so excited to join this cult. Guess I’ll delete it. MAYBE IF THE SYSTEN WASN'T SO MESSED UP, the app might work.

attributes.title: FAKE NEWS
attributes.review: All the people who give this app above a one star rating is FAKE NEWS. The app crashes as soon as you open it, and then I had to wait for 2 HOURS to get the app working again (My golden retriever was happy about the long walk though). The app is so disorganized and I can’t understand anything . Horrible.

attributes.title: Piece of crap
attributes.review: I tried to give trump a chance even if I didn’t like him but he made me so mad for example i sent him a pet lion and he put it down like bruh it’s an animal ur supposed to make America great again not make America and animal abuser😔😔then I sent him a letter asking him to make Mississippi good again but he just made it even more boring

attributes.title: I can’t believe this is even on the App Store!
attributes.review: Full of glitches and took forever to download. Extremely hard to figure out how to use and just absolutely ridiculous. On top of that it crashes every other time I try to open it! Very disappointed

attributes.title: Everything about this app is garbage
attributes.review: It takes forever to download, and once you do download it it takes forever to open and half the time crashes. My phone has been glitching non stop since I got it as well. Seriously I do NOT recommend.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER CREATED
attributes.review: worst app ever created this tool 5 weeks to download and made 25 virus’s on my phone also took up 60% of my phone storage don’t recommend this app horrible and also this app try’s to take your info they ask for thing like social security and personal items so disappointed in this app 😡

Greetings, 

  This is app is the worse thing ever! It’s just so slow, and this annoying orange man wearing a wig is all over it! I didn’t sign up for this! And I thought this guy was in a peach or smth. So disgraceful. It’s pathetic really. Truly pathetic. I thought my mother thought I was a monster but I guess we know who the real monster is 
- Princess Azula of the Fire nation

attributes.title: xie hua pao pao
attributes.review: i got this app to stay educated abt daddy trump but as soon as i did i was immediately shown a picture of him kissing a 10 year old girl!! i was obviously horrified that this app, which is supposed to glorify him was showing me such a disgusting image. as soon as i saw that i began projectile vomiting and was rushed to the er. i showed the doctor the picture and he started throwing up too. soon enough the entire medical staff was vomiting. the hospital is now being shut down. i’m throwing up as i write this review. do not buy this app. unless you’re into throwing up for hours.

attributes.title: The app harassed me
attributes.review: I downloaded the app attempting to learn more about the campaign when Donald trump got a hold of my number and started harassing it. A lot of perils began to spam me with trumps nudes and a lot of appalling images. I quickly deleted the app and to this day am getting harassment from these pictures and video. To say the least I’m scarred.

attributes.title: Horrible app🤬
attributes.review: The first thing is that it took 12+ hours to download and took up 18gb of memory. And than I open the app and all I see is is a orange screen 🟠. And at this point the app took 12+ hours to download, took 18gb of storage, and doesn’t even work. And all i wanted to do is support our great president!
